item.description: Wormhole is showing signs of recovery, surging 45% from its yearly low after announcing a strategic partnership with Ripple Labs.

item.title: Ripple Price Forecast: XRP risks decline below $2.00 despite Wormhole interoperability partnership
item.description: Ripple (XRP) extends losses on the third day in a row after its bullish momentum lost steam under the resistance level at $2.23. The path of least resistance is downward, with technical indicators reinforcing the bearish grip while the XRP price hovers at around $2.08 on Friday.
item.content:encoded: Ripple (XRP) extends losses on the third day in a row after its bullish momentum lost steam under the resistance level at $2.23. The path of least resistance is downward, with technical indicators reinforcing the bearish grip while the XRP price hovers at around $2.08 on Friday.
item.author: FXStreet (FXStreet)
